text: Schönebeck-Bad Salzelmen station is a railway station in the Bad Salzelmen district in the municipality of Schönebeck (Elbe), located in the Salzlandkreis district in Saxony-Anhalt, Germany. FDJ Jugendbahnhof (youth station) (May 1990). Entrance to the Mitropa restaurant, with salt production mural (May 1990). ==References== Category:Railway stations in Saxony-Anhalt Category:Buildings and structures in Salzlandkreis
title: Schönebeck-Bad Salzelmen station
